title: Crime Alert 03.13.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.13.19
description:
Police seize over three thousand pound of cocaine in shipping containers. Mother of Shannan Watts says she could feel her daughter’s murder. New York police bust a thief using new pattern recognition software.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
